description: From rest +â€Ž harrow, from the idea that the plant's tough roots would stop a harrow (agricultural implement used to break up soil).

entries.meaning: Any of various species of small shrubs making up the genus Ononis, especially Ononis repens, which has pink flowers.
examples: Common Restharrow rises up with diverse rough, woody twigs, half a yard or a yard high, set at the joints without order [...].
